title: Thresh lantern fun twist
body: What if they made it so thresh lantern can also be clicked on by the enemy and pull them to thresh? Imagine all the counter play! The idea came to me seeing a thresh throw lantern to river to scare the enemy bot lane away thinking it was a gank. I thought " what if enemy jungler happened to be there when thresh decided to do that, they take the lantern and BAM counter gank . That would be hilarious. It would also force thresh players to properly place the lantern when trying to save allies.
